title: [Ruins, Graveyard's View]
description: A carved stone hut with shuttered doors and windows takes up the majority of this platform.  Resting against the hut's side is a pile of humanoid armor, each half-melted.  In the distance, the ship graveyard surrounding the atoll is clearly visible.

A carved stone hut with shuttered doors and windows takes up the majority of this platform.  Resting against the hut's side is a pile of humanoid armor, each half melted for scraps.  In the distance, the ship graveyard surrounding the atoll is clearly visible.
